trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event occurs after a row is painted on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> evento ocorre depois que uma linha é pintada em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> allows you to manually adjust the appearance of the row after the cells in the row are painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> permite que você ajuste manualmente a aparência da linha depois que as células na linha são pintadas.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to customize the row.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil se você quiser personalizar a linha.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to make the content of a cell span the entire row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> eventos para tornar o conteúdo de uma célula abrangem toda a linha.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the row that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que possui a linha que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> que está sendo pintado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que especifica o estado da linha.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the row.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro associada à linha.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains formatting and style information about the row.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que contém informações de formatação e de estilo sobre a linha.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se a linha atual é a primeira exibida no momento no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se a linha atual é a última no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que tem a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> definida como <see langword="true" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="inheritedRowStyle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inheritedRowStyle" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> propriedade representa a área do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um usuário abrange todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> com outra janela e, em seguida, em seguida, descobre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> representa todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Se um usuário aborda uma área pequena do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> e, em seguida, em seguida, descobre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> representa a área de pequena foi coberta.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the focus area.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área de foco.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" /> property to determine the color of the focus rectangle; <see langword="false" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para usar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" /> para determinar a cor do retângulo de foco; <see langword="false" /> para usar a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws the focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o retângulo de foco em torno dos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> método ao desenhar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> e as células de conteúdo por conta própria.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> method to draw a focus around the visible cells of the row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> método para desenhar um foco em torno das células visíveis da linha.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que representa uma mensagem de erro para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa uma mensagem de erro atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property is the same as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que a linha atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usados para pintar atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe fornece propriedades e métodos que são úteis para desenho personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to paint a custom background.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedade para pintar o plano de fundo personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Although the code actually uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, this property is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Embora o código realmente usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, essa propriedade é praticamente idêntica ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A variável `e`, é do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de célula aplicado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains the cell style applied to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que contém o estilo de célula aplicado ao atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property contains the same values as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> propriedade contém os mesmos valores que a linha atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Directly accessing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> can affect performance.
trans-unit.target: Acessando diretamente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> pode afetar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> evento para evitar descompartilhar a linha e manter o desempenho ideal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property, the new settings will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Embora você possa definir as propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> recuperados por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> propriedade, as novas configurações não terão efeito.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> to determine the color to use to draw the content.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> para determinar a cor a ser usada para desenhar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A variável `e`, é do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the first row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a linha atual é a primeira exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row being painted is currently the first row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a linha que está sendo pintada no momento é exibida na primeira linha do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the last visible row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a linha atual é a última exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a linha atual for a última linha a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que tem o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> propriedade definida como <see langword="true" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> que especificam as partes a serem pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified cell parts for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta as partes da célula especificada para a área nos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para pintar a tela de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> para pintar a tela de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell backgrounds for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta as telas de fundo da célula da área nos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell contents for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o conteúdo da célula da área nos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: Paints the row header of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o cabeçalho de linha da linha atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to paint the row header with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> to paint the row header with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para pintar o cabeçalho de linha com a cor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> para pintar o cabeçalho de linha com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the entire row header of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o cabeçalho da linha inteira do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> que especificam as partes a serem pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the row header of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Pinta as partes específicas do cabeçalho da linha atual.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> menos um.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obter os limites da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> property is the same as the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: A largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: To get the width of the columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a largura das colunas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> property to determine the bounds of the visible cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> para determinar os limites das células visíveis em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The row index can be used to access the current row within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha pode ser usado para acessar a linha atual em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to access the current row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> propriedade para acessar a linha atual.

trans-unit.source: The code gets the value of the cell at the intersection of the selected row and the third column, and then paints this value over the entire row.
trans-unit.target: O código obtém o valor da célula na interseção da linha selecionada e a terceira coluna e, em seguida, pinta esse valor em toda a linha.

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A variável `e`, é do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que especifica o estado da linha.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para determinar se a linha está congelada, somente leitura ou selecionado, entre outros estados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.State%2A> property to determine whether the current row is selected.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.State%2A> propriedade para determinar se a linha atual é selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A variável `e`, é do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: personalizar a aparência de linhas no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
